about_the_game:
ALMOST is a thrilling first-person speedrun game featuring a unique dimension-swapping mechanic that requires quick thinking and precise execution. Take on the challenge of intense parkour gameplay as you slide, double jump, dash, and utilize special abilities to navigate through levels at breakneck speed. With a range of movement options at your disposal, you’ll need to be quick on your feet to avoid deadly obstacles and race towards the finish line.

Features:

  • Intense Parkour Gameplay: ALMOST’s fast-paced 3D parkour gameplay will push your abilities to the limit. Run and jump through levels, but be sure to time your moves perfectly to avoid falling to your doom.
  • Dimension-Swapping Mechanic: Warp between alternate dimensions to navigate through challenging levels and overcome obstacles, all while racing against the clock.
  • Challenging Levels: ALMOST will keep you on your toes as you work towards achieving the perfect run.
  • Worldwide Leaderboards: Compete against players from around the world and see where you rank on the leaderboards.

Experience the ultimate rush!

List of planned improvements:

  • Additional Maps: We are actively working on creating a variety of new maps to further challenge players and expand their gameplay experiences.
  • Improved Controls: We are committed to continuously refining and enhancing the game’s control scheme to provide players with a smoother and more responsive experience.
  • Performance Optimization: We are working to optimize the game’s performance to ensure that it runs smoothly and efficiently on a wider range of hardware.
  • Bug Fixes: We are actively addressing any bugs or issues that players encounter in the game to improve overall stability and playability.

Potential Features Under Consideration / in development:

  • Special Abilities: Utilize a wide range of special abilities to enhance your parkour moves, including a grappling hook to swing through levels and bouncing abilities to quickly navigate through obstacles.
  • Map Editor: Design your own custom levels and share them with the community, or try out user-created maps to keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.
  • Team Races: Compete with other players in team-based races.

As ALMOST is still under development, please note that the features mentioned here are subject to change. We are always open to feedback and suggestions from the community as we work to improve and evolve the game. Join our Discord community to be a part of the development process, share your ideas, and participate in discussions with other players. Stay up-to-date on the latest news and updates, and connect with the community to have your voice heard. Together, let’s create something truly special and bring ALMOST to life.

We believe that involving the community in the development process is essential to creating a game that resonates with our audience. Therefore, we encourage you to share your thoughts and ideas with us, as we are actively working on implementing new features and improving the game based on player feedback. Your input is valuable to us, and we appreciate any feedback or criticism from the community.

Join our Discord community to be a part of the development process, share your ideas, and participate in discussions with other players. Stay up-to-date on the latest news and updates, and connect with the community to have your voice heard. Together, let's create something truly special and bring ALMOST to life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300 / Intel Core i5-2500K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 460 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3350GE / Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, AMD RX 480 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
